comments:
I am getting internal errors in the Java Perspective whenever I type something that would result 
in a compile time error.  Information follows.  This is on build20020328 running on WindowsNT 
SP6.1.  The disadvantage to this is that until I save, I get the Internal Error dialog every few 
seconds and have to press the 'No' button to get out of it.  This makes for editing the source very 
difficult!

Thanks.
Jason Rogers

<message> (from Iternal Error dialog)
An 
internal error has occurred.
Failed to execute 
runnable
(org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertFailedException: assertion failed; 
)
See error log for more details.

Exit 
workspace?
</message>
